title: tirupparam kunra
sahitya:
tirupparam kunra vElA tiru AlavAi para
 shivanOD-angayarkaNNi konji muttADum-bAla


anupallavi

  viruppurum viNNOrkkum kiDaikkarum tIntamizh
tiruppuazh pADa nin tiruvaruL tA shIrmighum


caraNam 1    amarar munivarum meyyaDiyavarum vaNangi
kumarA kumarA enru tudikkak-kOyil koNDa
  caraNam 2    rAmadAsan paNiyum tAmarasa pAdanE
mAmayil vAhanA vaLLi deivAnai mOHanA
